Question
========
Fill in the blanks:

i.The confidence interval becomes ... when the standard deviation increases. 
ii. The confidence interval becomes narrower when the reliability of the point estimate ... .

Answerlist
----------
* i: wider, ii: decreases.
* i: narrower, ii: decreases.
* i: wider, ii: increases.
* i: narrower, ii: increases.
